name: places/ChIJndfCM55ZwokRzKkJxAjcIsY
formattedAddress: 308A E 15th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 308A E 15th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: When we moved to NYC and we were looking for a primary care, it took us a while to find someone we felt confident about. And then we met Dr. Martinho. She always makes time to listen to the full picture of your symptoms and as my primary care physician I feel in very competent hands. She talks directly and to the point, you never feel rushed or unwelcome and her staff are super lovely and caring. Definitely recommend.

text.text: When we moved to NYC and we were looking for a primary care, it took us a while to find someone we felt confident about. And then we met Dr. Martinho. She talks directly and to the point, you never feel rushed or unwelcome and her staff are super lovely and caring. Definitely recommend.

originalText.text: I went as a new patient to Dr. Martinho, when I got to the office I really did not care for the front part of the office, but I said to my self give it a chance. I saw the doctor and said to myself okay she seems very nice and explained everything very well. They did bloodwork and she stated to me that my results will come in the patient portal here we are 11 days later and no results in the portal and no call or email from the doctor. I was there for a problem and for blood work, and she also new that I was specifically looking to see where my levels are at. Very important to be on the right medication. I am very disappointed.

originalText.text: I recently moved to NYC, and had put off finding a primary care physician because I despise going to the doctor.  For some reason, going to the doctor has always been like a stress level 11 for me! However, Dr. Martinho was awesome and I am so happy to have found her! She answered all my questions thoroughly and made me feel so relaxed. It is such a relief to know that my concerns were heard by her. Thank you so much Dr. Martinho!

text.text: I recently moved to NYC, and had put off finding a primary care physician because I despise going to the doctor.  For some reason, going to the doctor has always been like a stress level 11 for me! However, Dr. Martinho was awesome and I am so happy to have found her! She answered all my questions thoroughly and made me feel so relaxed. It is such a relief to know that my concerns were heard by her. Thank you so much Dr. Martinho!

originalText.text: Dr. Martinho is an excellent doctor: smart, professional, kind, thoughtful. Unfortunately the staff is curt, disinterested and condescending. I have waited more than an hour past my appointment time, I have been overcharged and spent months getting them to correct it, I’ve asked simple questions and had them respond rudely. Her office takes only limited insurance, and are not clear about costs. A recent standard physical ended up costing, quite unexpectedly, more than $700 in “standard” tests. I like Dr. Martinho very much, but her staff has made it nearly impossible to go back. A quick edit to add: her website says Covid tests, "are 100% covered with or without insurance." That's not true: we were billed for the test by the lab that processed it.

originalText.text: Have been seeing Dr. Martinho since she began this practice. She's brilliant, empathetic and forward thinking. Her staff is warm and professional. Our whole family are patients here and we couldn't be happier.
